pageContext.course_type_long_description: Prepare for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! Build projects inspired by cool machines close to home, such as Trains, Helicopters, Treehouses, and Beam Bridges. Then build models flying machines, from the famous Wright Flyer, to Hot Air Balloon, and NASA rockets. Discover how real-world aircraft and spacecraft actually fly in this new full-day themed camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM + Aerospace Engineering w/LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY
